nodes.text: The Command Droid Mark V was a model of humanoid-shaped battle droid produced by the Okara Droid Company at the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. They carried personal blaster cannons, and were used in the factory during the Cold War.
Command Droid Mark V's appear as enemies in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where they can be found in the Okara Droid Factory on the Imperial version of Balmorra.
